gist.headline: Planting a Sticker Garden
gist.blurb: Turn your wildest ideas into peel-able reality. Sticker Garden has taken root in our Creative showcase.
gist.summary: Added Sticker Garden to the Creative apps list, enabling users to generate sticker-ready images with style presets and batch variants.
gist.impact: Users can now access a dedicated tool for creating custom stickers directly from the platform.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee in a scrapbooking setting, placing a large, glossy pixel-art sticker of a flower onto a page. The environment is a mix of a garden and a craft station.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot placing a glossy flower sticker into a pixelated scrapbook. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee wears a tiny artist beret and is surrounded by sheets of colorful stickers with white borders. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'STICKER GARDEN'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
